author: sergio.sp
title: CARDANO SCAMWATCH TASK FORCE
description: The means of viralization of the rumor have changed. Today fake news spreads like wildfire, through multiple insecure points of influence.

author: skyros
title: Prevent Attacks on Cardano
description: Malicious attackers can launch Distributed Denial-of-Truth (DDoT) attacks to undermine trust in the Cardano ecosystem.

author: reshm
title: Fact Check for Cardano
description: It is hard to distill through the disinformation related to Cardano and there isn't an easy way to do fact check.

author: felixweber
title: Cross Chain Cyber Security Collab
description: Spam & Scam attacks are an enormous thread for all DLT/Blockcain communities. Several Communities work on solutions. how can we collaborate

author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: Timelines and Treasury Data
description: Data about Cardano treasury and funds are distributed between multiple sources in multiple formats.

author: mercya1
title: Reduce Disinformation With Facts
description: Lack of factual information dissemination make communities susceptible to disinformation attacks.

author: submarine7
title: Publishers Information Hub
description: Disinformation, malinformation may disrupt the normal operations of a community, its services or network

author: petervg
title: Factpage: Cardano fact check site
description: Fake news and disinformation about Cardano is given strength when facts cannot be independently audited and separated from falsehoods.

author: yutazzz
title: Japanese FUD / SCAM Buster 100
description: There is no team to deal with Japanese SCAM and FUD (ADA is gambling coin etc.).

author: francek
title: Scam & disinformation database
description: Scams & fake news are not always quickly recognized by innocents, since they either have no time to process the onslaught of it or are naive

author: gargiulo.gianni
title: Defending Cardano Staking Ecosystem
description: Fraudulent and malicious stakepools pose an urgent and growing threat to Cardano's staking ecosystem and network security.
